Description:
The beauty of a brilliant revival
A picturesque profile shining with modern beauty is the perfect introduction to the brilliant indoor and outdoor spaces of this stunning single-level home. A Designer renovation and a sunny personality are recurring themes throughout a spacious open plan living/dining domain, incorporating a sleek stone kitchen with quality appliances and rear family room versatile as a 3rd bedroom. Timber floors, neutral tones and stone throughout enhance 2 robed bedrooms, main with deluxe enusite plus stylish central bathroom. A serene sanctuary for young professionals, first home buyers, investors and downsizers, this superb home concludes with alarm, heating/cooling, garden courtyard and secure single carport with roller door, moments to Keeley Reserve, bus routes, train station, schools, Clayton shops and Monash Medical Centre.
George Korderas : 0417 521 080
Insights: 13 other 3 bedroom unit in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
CONVENIENTLY LOCATED IN A PEACEFUL FAMILY STREET!!
On a corner block entering into a quiet court, this beautifully presented one owner brick veneer home represents fantastic value for families wishing to live in an area where local schools are just a few minutes away. Public transport local shops and parklands are also nearby. Inside you will find newly polished hardwood floors throughout, a spacious lounge/dining room and kitchen featuring gas cooktop open to separate meals area. There are 3 generous bedrooms all with BIR including master with WIR and renovated semi en-suite as well as a renovated bright bathroom, separate toilet and a full laundry. Ducted heating and cooling unit are also included while outside you will find a neat and tidy low maintenance garden plus garden shed.
Insights: 114 Osborne Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
ALL SOLD- ANOTHER DEVELOPMENT WANTED!
Excellent opportunity for the first home buyers, down- sizes and investors to secure a quality town residence in this boutique development.
Currently under construction, the development comprises of 2 double storey high quality townhouses and a single storey rear townhouse.
Within close proximity to the Westall Train Station, local shopping strip, Clayton Train Station, and only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre and major arterials.
Unit 1: 3 bedroom - double storey townhouse (UNDER OFFER)
Unit 2: 2 bedroom - double storey townhouse, (UNDER OFFER)
Unit 3: 2 bedroom - single storey (UNDER OFFER)
FOR FURTHER INFORMATION CONTACT:
ALEX VOULADAS: 0419 385 359

Description:
A LARGE AND MODERN 3 BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE
This property is conveniently located close to Westall train station, shops, buses and Westall Secondary College and as soon as you enter this street front townhouse you'll immediately be impressed with the size of the home. The open plan feels light, airy and well designed and it will surely appeal to occupiers seeking a low maintenance lifestyle and investors chasing returns and great growth potential. It features a large lounge/dining room with floating timber floors and a family/meals area which incorporates the beautiful kitchen with stainless appliances and a corner pantry. There are 3 robed bedrooms upstairs including the master with a walk in wardrobe and an ensuite to match the family bathroom and additional powder room downstairs. Ducted heating and a split system air conditioner provide additional comfort and there's also a north facing courtyard with a water tank and a single garage with remote controlled door and internal access.
Insights: 2/13 Rosebank Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Best Location Ever! Exceptional Modern Elegance!
LAND SIZE: 223m2 approx
Excellent opportunity available for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this deluxe double storey residence situated within walking distance to Westall Secondary College, Westall Train Station, Bus stop, parklands, local shops, post office and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping District, Clayton Community Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
This architecturally designed townhouse with excellent craftsmanship throughout features ensuite and WIR to master bedroom, four large bedrooms, two with build-in-robes, spacious living area, modern bathrooms, kitchen with island stone benchtop, stainless-steel appliances, gas ducted heating, home security system, water tank and much, much more!
Easy access to your double lock up garage from your fabulous private outdoor area with low maintenance courtyard, it is a perfect and practical design for your daily life, plus entertaining family and friends!
Look no further! This is what you have been dreaming of! Move right in to enjoy this fabulous lifestyle!

Description:
Quality, Luxury & a High Amenity Locale.
High on quality, low on fuss, this one hits the heights of streetfront living in a high amenity locale. Just one block to the shopping precinct, Aquatic Centre and library, public transport and minutes to Monash Medical Centre and University, this substantial four bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, dual zone home is optioned up with every extra, including ducted heating, cooling and vacuum (with kickboard function), video-intercom, alarm and an oversized auto-garage plus parking.
Luxuriously finished with Spotted Gum floors, marble and granite benchtops and elite appliances (including AEG double ovens) and Duropal cabinetry for the glass-splashback kitchen, this high-end home features a dual-vanity ensuite, fitted robes incldung a master WIR, thermostatic hot-water and 2000L tank.
But the biggest luxury is the luxury of great space with a formal lounge, vast living/dining wrapping a cafe blind-enclosed, fan-cooled al fresco room and oversized bedrooms including two with desk areas!
Insights: 1/4 Parsons Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
A Stylish Glamour Central To It All
Boasting its own frontage, quality fixtures, zoned living, strong contemporary appeal and a premium location trendy buyers and savvy investors will love, give your social life a real boost with the purchase of this suave and sophisticated two-bedroom Townhouse.
With Clayton train station, Clayton Community Centre, the Clayton shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, schools and parklands only moments away, a lifestyle that's high on convenience is an absolute given here.
So too is a carefree, low maintenance lifestyle ideal for the homebuyer desiring lock up and go living! Stunning open-plan living occupies the entire upstairs layout, extending onto a large terrace for indoor-outdoor entertaining and accommodating a generous living zone, sun-kissed meals and open kitchen styled with stone benchtops and quality stainless steel appliances.
That leaves the ground-floor layout to play host to the home's two spacious bedrooms. And while the Master bedroom boasts its own fully-tiled ensuite, the second bedroom also enjoys seamless access to a luxurious fully-tiled bathroom of its own.
Finished with warm timber floorboards, abundant natural light, powder room upstairs, split-system heating and cooling and a single car space with storage cage, this excellent property demands your attention.

Description:
Clayton's Next Golden Mile!
Total land approx 1,185m2 with 33m frontage (approx.)
Fantastic double block together on the market for the first time - total land approx. 1,185m2 for builders and/or developers to begin to make their own golden mile project. A wide frontage of approx. 33m, will certainly impress anyone who wishes to make their dream project of townhouses or an apartment complex come true (STCA). Land dimensions approx 33.86 x 35.01m. With easy access to Clayton Station and Westall Road, public transport, Clayton Shopping strip, cafe's, restaurant's, Monash Hospital and Monash University, and so much more.
Don't miss this great opportunity to make you dream project come true!
For more details contact Sharline 0416 086 818 or Hong 0426 611 727.

A wide frontage of approx. 33m, will certainly impress anyone who wishes to make their dream project of townhouses or an apartment complex come true (STCA). Land dimensions approx 33.86 x 35.01m. With easy access to Clayton Station and Westall Road, public transport, Clayton Shopping strip, cafe's, restaurant's, Monash Hospital and Monash University, and so much more.
Don't miss this great opportunity to make you dream project come true!
For more details contact Sharline 0416 086 818 or Hong 0426 611 727.

Description:
Simon Says,This Is The Home You Want!
Talk about the home that has everything!Rising majestically from its slightly elevated allotment to project an air of grandeur that's replicated inside, this stately family residence of four bedrooms and two living zones is just the kind of upgrade your growing family has been craving.
From the very outset, you're introduced to the home's stately persona as a big and bright family living greets your arrival, delighting with its vast size and flowing sense of space.
The positive impressions of space and quality extend into the central kitchen, styled beautifully with modern cabinetry and quality stainless steel appliances, and if you love to entertain, you'll love the seamless integration between the separate dining and huge decked entertaining area (with spa).
Venture upstairs and discover an impressively large Master bedroom with built-in robes, beautifully finished ensuite and balcony, with additional bedrooms zoned in privacy downstairs along with a spacious family bathroom.
And then there's the space so much space! Garage and carport provides generous off-street parking, while those working from home could easily convert the workshop at the rear into a home office.
In an excellent location within walking distance of Namatjira Reserve and only moments away from Clayton train station, Clayton Central shopping district, Clayton South Primary School, St Andrew's Catholic Primary School, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University, this is an opportunity not to be missed.
Disclaimer: We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document. Purchasers should make their own enquires and refer to the due diligence check-list provided by Consumer Affairs. Click on the link for a copy of the due diligence check-list from Consumer Affairs. http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Residing just minutes to local amenities. This sensational little gem is exceptionally appealing. Act fast and enquire now!

Description:
Take Notice all First Home Buyers and Investors!
This property offers a great opportunity for first home buyers to purchase an updated home in the popular Clayton South area. An opportunity also exists for potential landlords for their first investment property or to add to their existing portfolio.
This original home has had a makeover and you are able to move in immediately. The home offers 2 substantial bedrooms with the possibility of becoming 3 with large built in robes, ceiling fans and polished floorboards. The kitchen comprises gas cooking, dishwasher and a family size meals area.
The home sits on approximately 300 square metres of land, is the front one of only 2 on the block has a lovely timber deck right across the front of the home, private front yard and completed with a double lock up garage.
Extras include: ducted heating, ceiling fans, air conditioner, dishwasher, new curtains and blinds and polished floorboards throughout
Located minutes from the Westall train station, Westall primary and secondary schools, parks and gardens.
A short drive will have you on Clayton train station, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University.
We have a very motivated vendor so come and have a look at this property without delay.

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY @ 11AM !!!
Sitting on approx. 600m2 of land this is the perfect platform to develop, start your investment portfolio or provides an ideal foundation to build your dream palace. Follow suit with the prudent investors who have subdivided and built 2 dwellings (S.T.C.A) and capitalize on a sure investment.
Adding to the land is a charming and tremendously kept 2 bedroom home providing all the essentials making it easy to live in or rent out.
You'll be surprised by the serenity being moments away from Clayton shops, restaurants, public transport and schools including Monash University. Don't miss out on this rare offering and inspect today!
Insights: 3 Bond Street, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
A RENOVATED & SPACIOUS GROUND FLOOR APARTMENT
Renovated and presented better than new, this ground floor apartment in Clayton South makes an ideal first home or a very sensible investment with options for permanent or increasingly popular short term rentals. In a well maintained double brick building set just down the road from Clayton South Primary School, the beautiful Namatjira Park and within minutes of central Clayton shops and transport the home provides the ultimate in low maintenance living. It features a generous living area with electric heater and floating floors as well as a renovated 2 pac kitchen with Emilia stainless steel oven/stove and an included meals area. There are 2 large bedrooms each with built in wardrobes plus a renovated bathroom with a washing machine allocation and a titled car space for off street parking.
Insights: 2/23 Merlyn Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish, Low-maintenance Living With Lifestyle Appeal
A fusion of style and quality craftsmanship, this streetfront executive townhouse is a leader in contemporary living, delivering a flawless, low-maintenance upkeep. Perfectly considered, this light-filled home conveys a stylish relaxed attitude to suit the young at heart with neutral tones welcoming a spacious open plan living/meals area incorporating a well-appointed chic kitchen. 3 robed bedrooms, including main with WIR/ensuite are complemented by a modern bathroom, ducted heating, split system cooling, powder room and double garage adding an extra element of immense appeal from either first home buyer or investor perspectives. Emphasising space and convenience, only a short drive to Ikea, Clayton shopping centre, Springvale shopping Centre, Monash University, Monash Hospital and freeway.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
Ideal for Home Buyers or potential investment
If you are seeking a home for your family, this has a lot to offer. Within walking distance to Primary school, Park and bus, just a short drive from Clayton's Shopping and cafe strip, train station and Monash Medical Centre. As a corner block there is plenty of space for kids to play in the front or secure backyard with private outdoor area for your family. Spacious living, spotless kitchen, 3 Bedrooms with robes, ducted heating & vacuum system and single lock up garage. This corner block also has the potential for future development, do not miss out on this great opportunity.
Ivy Liu : 0433 163 766
Insights: 7 Warraweena Road, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
QUIETLY POSITIONED ON A GENEROUS BLOCK
In a court like position adjoining parkland, this home on a generous block holds plenty of appeal for first home buyers, young families and investors. In good condition the home features a classic brick façade and covered front patio and inside you find polished hardwood floors gracing the lounge room that is accompanied by a family/meals area and a modern kitchen with electric cook top plus a stainless oven and dishwasher. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a semi ensuite plus a family bathroom and a study or fourth bedroom. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling provide additional comfort while outside you find a massive backyard, a garden shed and single carport. Right near Clayton South Primary School and buses the home is also just minutes away from Clarinda Shopping Centre and central Clayton.
Insights: 1 Kitson Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.
